name: Little Alchemist Lab
description:
Puzzle game with easy rules and fast gameplay. You must move alchemical flasks at designated positions in board game, the hexagrams of the level alchemical formula. Each color flask is a different alchemical element.

Just select a flask or other moveable element, and push it in one cardinal directions. It  will stop his move when hiting a board wall, other game element or mechanism.

Level is won when all flasks are over same color hexagrams.

You will have to deal with 20 differents elements and mechanisms along the game. Discover glass, wood and metal alchemical flasks, sharp stakes, conveyors, auto-pneumatic pit holes, soft return back hydraulic cylinders, gunpowder barrels, Greek fires, rotating flails, keys and locks, alchemical harrows, wagons, sand-glass, alchemical fountains, antique jars, inverters for reversible conveyors, anti magnetic fields, alchemical trash cans, and some others who comes with all of that.

Game include 3 game modes and 20 optional tutorial levels to initiate player with elements and mechanisms, just as much as board labyrinths moving techniques.

In One player and Team game mode, you must do the 55 levels formulas. In Team mode, 2 players can play at same time, each playing on his board on left and right of screen. When one player win, the team win. Progression system use won levels and medals count. Medals are allowed for recorded levels time to win. Players and Teams can use 5 profiles to save game progression.

You can also use Battle game mode for 2 players.  Choose difficulty and game randomize levels for 3 or 5 rounds battles with one rule, be the faster to do formula.

Be  carrefull, the game difficulty is not adapted to young childs. Levels are designed to never block the player with a mistake, with progressive difficulty, but the game is for peoples who like brain challenges, like puzzles games, chess problems, strategy, all games who need to anticipate moves, and discover news mechanisms...You can try the demo to evaluate first levels difficulty.

You can use one keyboard for 2 players. Players can also use the mouse or Xbox compatible pads.

Full game include 75 levels, 20 tutorials, 55 in game. About 6 to 12 hours to finnish game, with some attempts in last case...

Carefull : Game need 16/9 screen or window to work. Tested from 1280*720 to 1920*1080. Game is originaly designed to work in 1920*1080 screen or windows. If your screen is not 16/9, verify you can open a window of at least 1280*720. 

You can load the demo and try it in doubt. Try avoid modify launcher controls setup, you can configure controls in game.

The demo include the full 20 playable tutorial levels and the 10 first levels of game, playable in Solo and Team game modes. Progression will be saved for full game.
